item.title: CVE-2024-25936|2024-03-15T12:55:57.952Z -- soundcloud%20inc.%2C%20lawrie%20malen -- soundcloud%20shortcode
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in SoundCloud Inc., Lawrie Malen SoundCloud Shortcode allows Stored XSS.This issue affects SoundCloud Shortcode: from n/a through 4.0.1.
